mapper.sql: SELECT a.ID id, a.EMP_NO empNo, a.EMP_NAME empName, a.ENG_NAME engName, a.USER_ID userId, a.JOIN_DATE joinDate, a.SEXLY sexly, a.COUNTRY country, a.ANCESTRAL ancestral, a.HOUSEHOLD_ADD householdAdd, a.DOMICILE domicile, a.EDUCATION education, a.COLLEGE_NAME collegeName, a.ID_NUMBER idNumber, a.IS_SURSANCE isSursance, a.PHONE phone, a.EMAIL email, a.URGENT_PHONE urgentPhone, a.TEAM_ID teamId, a.BIRTHDAY birthday, a.GRADUATION_DATE graduationDate, a.IS_PARTY isParty, a.IS_HIRE isHire, a.IS_OPERATING isOperating, a.IS_PERFORMANCE isPerformance, a.IS_SAL isSal, a.IS_ATT isAtt, a.IS_SHAKE isShake, a.SCH_ID schId, a.PERFORMANCE performance, a.DELETED deleted, a.COMPANY_ID companyId, a.CREATE_TIME createTime, a.IS_ID_CARD isIdCard, a.CREATE_BY createBy, a.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, a.MODIFY_BY modifyBy
mapper.select: FROM hcm.EMP_FOLDER_HCM a LEFT JOIN hcm.CONTACT_ORG_TO_EMP b ON a.id = b.emp_folder_id WHERE b.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.DELETED = 'F' AND b.DELETED = 'F' AND a.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT efh.emp_no doEmpNo, efh.emp_name doEmpName FROM hcm.emp_folder_hcm efh left join auth_authorization.cas_user cu on cu.emp_no = efh.emp_no and cu.deleted = 'F' WHERE cu.ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND efh.deleted = 'F'
